info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN EDDY AND WEST CENTRAL LEA COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM MDT... At 221 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Avalon, or 18 miles southeast of Artesia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Maljamar, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport, and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for southeastern New Mexico.
